mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_bbs_reply (bbs_idx, title, user_id, reg_date) VALUES(#{bbs_idx}, #{title}, #{user_id}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT idx, bbs_idx, title, user_id, reg_date FROM tbl_bbs_reply ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_bbs SET reply_cnt = reply_cnt+1 WHERE idx=#{bbs_idx}
